## StyleColor type

Description of colors inside a style. Supports hex values as well as CSS hex, rgb and hsl values (i.e. `0xffffff`<!-- -->, `#f00fab`<!-- -->, `#aaa`<!-- -->, `rgb(255, 0 120)`<!-- -->, `hsl(360, 100%, 100%)`<!-- -->, etc.).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StyleColor = string | number;
```
